replies.body:
Just an FYI on the replay, in order to record a replay you can go to your match history in the client, once there you will find a small round button (containing an arrow pointing downward to a "box") next to each game which can be used to download the replay for that game. Once downloaded, you can view the replay  using the same button (should change to a "play" arrow surrounded by a "circular arrow") and record as much of the match as you want. Recordings will appear in the "Highlights" tab of your profile, which will include a button that will take you to the files location on your computer (round button containing a file icon, next to the selected highlight).

Keep in mind, videos showing players breaking the rules may be removed due to the standing "no name and shame" policy on the boards.
